If you're looking for a playful, loving companion with an undeniably captivating look, Abner is the perfect match!

name: Coco
description_html: Coco is a lovable, medium-energy pup who enjoys walks, playtime, and snuggles. She‚Äôs housetrained, knows ‚Äòsit,‚Äô and is eager to find her forever home

name: Nova
description_html:
Nova was surrendered due to their owner's living arrangement changing. She's Smart, loyal, sweet, and playful. She's a very good girl for baths, too! Nova's favorite things are taking walks with her people, chasing balls, playing with squeaky toys, and enjoying a chew toy. Nova has lived with small and large dogs previously. She's awaiting her new home today!


From her foster parents:


Nova is an extremely sweet and curious dog who loves to be involved in every single conversation and is always eager to receive cuddles and praise. She loves eating kibbles and will drink lots of water when she's thirsty after long walks! She can be a little picky about her treats ‚Äì for instance, she does not love peanut butter treats so you may need to experiment. Nova is shockingly tolerating of baths, but she does not love getting her paws and eyes cleaned.


Nova loves running after balls but does not yet know how to retrieve them (maybe you can teach her!). She loves cars and car rides, and she is learning not to jump and lick when she is excited (to see you!). She may proudly carry your socks to you as a gift, and we still don't know why! She loves to sleep with you but can be trained not to if you don't want her on the bed. She is a little apprehensive of kids and may bark if they get too close. Nova is also protective of you and will bark at strangers in your home, but she becomes friendly when you tell her it's okay. She cares a lot about her people and will run over to help if you seem unwell.


Nova loves going on walks but is also very happy to stay home (where she naps and plays). She will run over and sit whenever she hears you pick up the leash! She is also really good at 'sit', especially if you have treats. She is super smart, so with lots of praises and treats, she can learn many more commands! She is very curious and will sniff most things unless it's a mop ‚Äì in which case she will hide behind you because she is scared of mops!


She loves following you around the house, but is not anxious to be by herself at home and responds very calmly to being in the crate. When we are outside, Nova makes sure that everyone is included, rushing home whenever someone is left behind! If she does not see you, she may also check every single car in the garage to make sure that you are not in there :)

name: Chewbaca
description_html:
Chewbaca had quickly earned his spot as a dog volunteers love to take out. He has excellent leash manners, he matches your pace and follows your lead with ease. In the play yard he has some adorably sporadic zoomies and is always up for fetch.

He likes to meet new people gently, and once you‚Äôre friends he‚Äôs all about the cuddles. This sweet boy is house trained, calm, and oh so loving. He‚Äôs newer to the shelter so we‚Äôre still getting to know this easy going sweetheart. Between his pleasant demeanor and his unique looks we don‚Äôt anticipate him being with us long.

name: Henrietta
description_html:
Henrietta is one of the most playful, joyful pups you‚Äôll ever meet. She loves a good snuggle on the couch or bed, and loves to chase tennis balls outside.


During her two months in foster care, she was housetrained, crate trained, polite to the many people she met (including kids!), and an excellent patio pup. She loves other dogs, especially if they can match her rowdy play style.

name: Serrano
description_html:
Serrano.......look at that smile!!


He is a playful sweet boy. He is house trained. He has the cutest bark. He enjoys going for walks and walks well on the leash. He is a medium energy dog that loves to play fetch. He even drops his toys for you to throw again and again. If you are slow at picking up the toys, he will let you know it and give you a quick hurry it up bark. He knows sit and down. He enjoys his treats and quality pets with his human.

name: Pumpkin
description_html:
Sweet and playful 9-month-old puppy


Stunning hazel eyes and creamy brown coat


Calm energy for a young pup


Does well with other dogs


Not reactive

name: Eerie
description_html: Such a lovable kitty‚Ä¶very shy at first, but will open up as soon as you hold her. She loves to play with her toys and dash across the room, and play hide and seek. As soon as I hold her, she lays in my arms and wants cuddles. You will fall in love with her!!

name: Apple Fritter
description_html:
Apple Fritter is the perfect mix of sweetness and smarts! This loving, cuddly boy adores being close to his people - whether it‚Äôs snuggling on the couch or leaning in for a hug. He‚Äôs a great listener and eager to please, making him a joy to have around.


Apple Fritter is both crate trained and house trained, so he‚Äôs already mastered his manners and is ready to fit right into your home. He loves attention but also knows how to relax quietly when it‚Äôs time to wind down.


If you‚Äôre looking for a loyal companion who will shower you with affection and make every day brighter, Apple Fritter is your guy!

name: Howie
description_html:
Howie is a sweet German Shepherd who is housetrained, very playful, and easygoing! He's had experience living with another dog at the shelter and going to playgroup, so he could do well with a dog-sibling after a meet & greet to make sure it's a good fit!

Howie sits quickly for treats or toys and loves to show how smart he is. He loves to splash in the kiddie pool, chase balls, and walks great on a leash! He would make a lovely addition to your family.

name: Evermore
description_html: Evermore is a very good boy who walks well on leash and will "sit" for a treat. He is housetrained and crate trained, as well. Evermore is affectionate with people and enjoys that quality time getting his walks at the shelter. We would love to see this boy in a home instead of a crate! Meet Evermore today!

name: Clara Bow
description_html:
Meet Clara Bow (aka Bowie)

Hi, I‚Äôm Clara Bow, but my friends call me Bowie - because I‚Äôm full of star power and a little bit of sparkle! I‚Äôm a young, happy girl (about 70 lbs) who loves people, other dogs, and pretty much everything about life. I bring sunshine wherever I go.


My Favorite Things

I‚Äôm house-trained, love walks, car rides, and playing with my dog friends. I get along great with both dogs and cats (yep, I‚Äôm that well-rounded). During the day, I like to explore, play with toys, or hang out with my foster brother. At night, I‚Äôll curl up next to you - I‚Äôm a world-class snuggler.


My Personality

I‚Äôve got that fun, goofy, young dog energy, so I‚Äôm looking for a family who is able to spend time with me to play. Whether it's with walks, yard time, adventures (bars, coffee shops pet stores, and playing tug-of-war, or another dog, I love living life and exploring. I‚Äôm working on my commands and doing great, but I‚Äôm young, curious, and sometimes a little ‚Äúmouthy‚Äù when I get excited (never aggressive - just young dog enthusiasm). A patient person that has experience with dogs would be great. I also think I'd be ok with a family that has older kids! I have experience with my foster mom's nieces and nephews who are really young, so that could work too but older kids will be better able to help train me :)


My Quirks (aka My Charms)

Like any dog who‚Äôs had to look out for herself, I really love food. Mealtime is the best part of my day, and sometimes I like to ‚Äúhelp‚Äù by checking if you‚Äôve dropped anything tasty when you're eating. I‚Äôve also been known to ‚Äúborrow‚Äù things around the house - socks, shoes, pens, you name it - just for fun and to see if they're edible. Everyone needs a hobby, right?


What I‚Äôm Looking For

I‚Äôd love a forever home with someone who:

  • Has experience with dogs is a must!
  • Can spend time playing with me
  • Ideally has another dog friend for me to romp around with
  • Preferably has a house with a yard or works from home if they're in an apartment. Someone who can dedicate the first couple of weeks to making sure I know you're coming back.*


*I was adopted once before for just a day, but was returned. I got really scared when I found myself alone in a brand new apartment and without my dog friend. I barked a lot because I didn‚Äôt understand what was happening. My adopter worked in an office four days a week and lived in an apartment, so they were worried about that. I don't do this with my current family who has a house and a cat/dog, but if adopted I just need someone patient who understands that adjusting takes me a little time, but once I feel at home I become confident.


If you‚Äôre looking for a loyal, funny, affectionate companion who‚Äôll make every day brighter, I might just be your Bowie!

name: Tigger
description_html:
Meet Tigger üíô


Tigger is one of those dogs who makes you smile the moment you meet him. Friendly, calm, and incredibly affectionate, he greets people with a loose, wiggly body, soft eyes, and a happy tail. Within minutes, he‚Äôs handing out kisses, leaning in for pets, and soaking up attention like he‚Äôs known you forever.


This sweet boy loves toys ‚Äî especially soft toys and tennis balls ‚Äî and will proudly bring them over to show off. In playtime rooms, he‚Äôs playful and happy, but he also knows how to relax and enjoy cuddles, belly rubs, and butt scratches. Volunteers consistently describe him as incredibly easy, well-mannered, and one of the most house-trained dogs they‚Äôve met in the shelter.


Tigger walks beautifully on leash and is very responsive to direction and cues. He knows how to sit, is treat-motivated, and does well transitioning in and out of his kennel. While he may show mild excitement when he sees other dogs, it‚Äôs friendly curiosity ‚Äî he‚Äôs non-reactive passing kennels and even stops to give sweet greetings through the gate, complete with wiggly tails and nose kisses.


He enjoys sniffing around, spending time with people, and would thrive in a home that offers love, routine, and maybe a few good toys to toss around. A house with a yard would be wonderful, but Tigger could also do well in an apartment with regular walks and enrichment.


Tigger is a laid-back cuddler with a playful side ‚Äî a truly special dog who‚Äôs ready to be someone‚Äôs best friend.


üí´ Good on leash

üí´ House-trained

üí´ Affectionate & cuddly

üí´ Toy-loving

üí´ Easy, gentle companion


If you‚Äôre looking for a sweet, loving dog who will adore you back tenfold, Tigger might just be your guy. üêæüíô

name: Daisy
description_html: Daisy is an adventurous soul who loves going on walks and exploring her surroundings. She can pull on leash, but she's working on that. Practice makes perfect! Daisy may be a little nervous with initial greetings, but it doesn't take long to see her tail wag and her body relax. She's ready to bust out of here and get on with her new life in a real home!

name: Canela
description_html: Canela has such a wonderful personality and is such a sweet girl. She‚Äôs playful and loves fetch with her stuffies (she‚Äôs pretty good at dropping them for you to toss too!). She also loves playing in the little puppy pools, and splashing around in them. She‚Äôs also very house trained! Once she works out her zoomies, she‚Äôs super easy on a leash. She‚Äôs a super cuddly young pup, and loves to lean against her human for pets and scratches.

name: Candy Corn
description_html:
Candy Corn is not your average dog! This handsome boy stands out with his incredibly unique eyes and coat‚Äîa striking brindle pattern set against an orange hue, earning him his sweet and tasty name.

He is a delightful companion who brings joy wherever he goes with his infectious smile.. Candy Corn is very housetrained and leash-trained, making him a breeze to live with. As a true Lab, he adores food and treats (which makes further training fun!).

He‚Äôs ready for fun with his favorite activity being fetch, which he‚Äôll happily play until you tire out. Candy Corn is a playful, loving, and unique pup ready to shower his forever family with affection!

name: Anya
description_html:
Meet Anya! A ferocious new species of pir-anya. This little girl loooves to be pampered - food, treats, play, pets, cuddles, you name it!

 

Anya is very sweet-tempered and easy to handle. She's a bit timid and skittish in new situations but will always come out for a treat or toy. Once she gets comfortable, she'll happily spend the day scampering around (she seems to bounce more often than walk...) and is a very independent kitten who will happily play on her own, but don't let that fool you - if given the green light, she shows off her personality as a prankster by pouncing on her foster mom's cats when they're not looking and bombarding them with air smacks. When she's not busy being a pir-anya, though, she loves being pet and snuggling with her foster mom at night or on the couch.


Anya is curious and playful around her foster mom's two cats while always respecting their boundaries. When they tell her no, she's happy to give them their space and play on her own. Given her straightforward and gentle nature, she could also be a good fit for households with children who have the patience to gain her trust, as she doesn't mind being picked up or touched anywhere and, when needed, is very vocal about her needs or dislikes.

name: Chocolate
description_html:
Chocolate is a shy, sweet, and handsome boy who loves his people! He is an easygoing pup who is good on a leash, housetrained, and looking for someone to help build his confidence. He‚Äôll reward you with his loyalty and affection.  

Chocolate could fit into many different lifestyles and living environments, so come meet him and see if he's right for you!

name: Catia
description_html: Catia is cuddly, playful, and likes the company of other cats. She would prefer that people let her come to you but once you gain her trust, she'll follow you everywhere! Catia desperately wants a forever human. This former street cat that is an excellent mouser, so she will pay her rent!

name: Deecee
description_html:
Meet DeeCee!

DeeCee is a sweet and playful girl who came to the shelter when she wasn‚Äôt getting along with one of the dogs in her previous home. She‚Äôs full of love and personality ‚Äî always ready to play ball, go for walks, or enjoy a good cuddle session, especially before bedtime!

This smart pup already knows several commands like ‚Äúsit‚Äù and ‚Äústay‚Äù, and she‚Äôs eager to please. According to her previous owner, DeeCee is good with cats and children, making her a wonderful fit for many families.

If you‚Äôre looking for an affectionate, loyal companion who will bring joy and energy into your life, come meet DeeCee today!

name: Dokie
description_html:
Our charmer here is Dokie and he arrived weather worn and will appreciate a cozy place to stay while his body and soul catches up. He's very easy going and quite charming, gentle on a walk and overall an easy going friend to people and to dogs. We feel he'll get along well with most dogs that don't try to bulldoze him over.

Dokie is a great choice for those who want to help a good dog get back to his very best.

His eyes are receiving treatment and he has some other needs to be checked over.

Come meet this sweetheart today. He's advocated for by his friends at Classic Canines ATX - Questions? If on site, reach out to staff. If offsite, reach out to his advocates caring@classiccanines.org

name: Peregrine
description_html:
Peregrine came in as a scaredy kitten, but she's grown into a shy but curious girl while she's been here. She enjoys pets and will stretch out and purr and might grab a bite to eat while you're petting her. Peregrine may still need a slow introduction to a new home (like most cats), but we don't think it will take long for her to settle in. Adopt this special girl today!

I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!

The adoption fee is waived for Peregrine and ALL Cactus Cats/Desperate Housecats!

name: Gorda
description_html:
Gorda is the kind of dog who wins people over without even trying. She‚Äôs a joyful, wiggly, affectionate young pup who thinks every person she meets is her new best friend. Volunteers call her a ‚Äúwalking ray of sunshine‚Äù ‚Äî she‚Äôs gentle on leash, friendly with other dogs, and always excited to explore the world with her human friends.

This girl is curious, clever, and incredibly treat-motivated, which makes training fun and easy. She loves learning new things, bouncing around with her dog friends, and then flopping over for pets and cuddles. Gorda currently shares a suite with another dog and attends playgroup most mornings, where she consistently shows good doggy manners and a social, easygoing play style.


Because she‚Äôs still a young dog, Gorda needs a family who‚Äôs ready to embrace a little goofiness and continue helping her learn the ropes. She‚Äôs eager to please, responsive, and already has a great foundation ‚Äî she just needs patient humans who will show her how to be the best girl she can be.


Gorda‚Äôs Highlights:

‚Ä¢ Dog-friendly and enjoys playgroups

‚Ä¢ Gentle leash walker and easy to handle

‚Ä¢ Very treat-motivated and highly trainable

‚Ä¢ Sweet, snuggly, and people-loving

‚Ä¢ Playful puppy energy in a compact, adorable package


If you‚Äôre looking for a cheerful, affectionate, fun-loving companion who will brighten your days and always be excited to see you, Gorda might be your perfect match. Come meet her ‚Äî this sweet girl is so ready for a home of her own. üíõ

name: Sushi
description_html:
Move over Pizza and step back Hamburger‚ÄîMr Sushi has entered the chat! I‚Äôm a polka dot prince who‚Äôs got a lot to say. Mostly filing official complaints about how you aren‚Äôt playing with or petting me. 


I adore attention from my humans and may give you a nip to get it‚Äîso I‚Äôll be best in a house with no kids. I have lived with a dog before and our energies didn‚Äôt align, but my foster parents think I may do well with another energetic cat to play with!


So if you are in the market for a lovable and loyal boy and wanna boop my perfect black nose for a lifetime, get your application in!

name: Mojo
description_html:
Meet Mojo ‚Äî the ultimate cuddle bug with a heart of gold

Mojo‚Äôs love languages are absolutely physical touch and quality time. He‚Äôll accept gifts if you insist, but what he truly wants is to be as close to his human as possible. From the moment you meet him, his gentle, affectionate nature shines. This boy is all about closeness, connection, and soaking up every bit of love he can get.


Mojo is a dream on leash, checks in often with his walker, and already knows cues like sit and shake. He‚Äôs polite, well-mannered, and radiates ‚ÄúI want to be your best friend‚Äù energy. He also keeps his kennel impressively tidy, suggesting he may be house trained. Passing people and dogs? No problem for this calm, steady guy‚Äîhe simply minds his manners and keeps moving.


If you‚Äôre looking for an affectionate, easygoing companion who loves deeply and loyally, Mojo is your match. Come see why everyone falls for this handsome lovebug.

name: Lady G
description_html: Lady G is a beautiful big girl who is very housetrained and always happy for a kennel break. She is easy to leash and strolls along nicely checking out the surroundings. Lady G shows curious interest in other dogs and exhibits the typical hound dog vocal traits. She is a sweet, gentle young dog and a mellow companion who is ready for her forever home. Come meet her!

name: Mesquite
description_html: Mesquite is a shy baby boy who seems to like the company of other cats. If you go slowly, you can make friends with him, too! The shelter can be a scary place, so we understand that this boy just needs a quiet and calm space to relax. He's an affectionate boy stuck in a scaredy cat body for now! Help Mesquite grow into a confident boy through adoption or foster today!

Meet Your New Best Friend! üêæ

This handsome boy is as sweet and loyal as they come! He‚Äôs already potty trained and leash trained, making him super easy to walk and hang out with. He loves people and has a calm, affectionate personality ‚Äî the kind of dog who‚Äôs happiest just being by your side.

He‚Äôs currently getting neutered and started on heartworm prevention, so he‚Äôll be healthy and ready for his forever home soon.

Right now, he does show some aggression toward other dogs, but we‚Äôre hopeful that will improve after his neuter and once he settles into a loving home. He‚Äôs very gentle and well-behaved with people, and with a little patience and structure, he‚Äôs going to make an amazing companion.

If you‚Äôre looking for a loyal, sweet, and easygoing dog to share your days with, this guy is the perfect match. ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Gingersnap
description_html:
Gingersnap was extremely shy when first coming to the shelter but her personality has truly begun to shine!


  • Silly and will always keep you laughing
  • Sweet and will give you all the kisses
  • Housetrained to a T
  • Playful as can be
  • Dog social


She is not lacking in the personality area and if you take her home you will never be lacking in the love area.


Come meet Gingersnap today!

name: Veruca Fiona Apple Salt
description_html: Veruca Fiona Apple Salt may have four names, but she is one sweet kitty! I've been fostering her for about a month now, and she has been a real delight. Very well-behaved, easygoing, and the BEST sleeper. She's also good with newcomers and has made fast friends with any guests I've had over. She is content to hang out with her people and stick close, but doesn't require constant attention. Veruca would be happiest as the only child. She is ready to explore her new home today!

name: Lopez
description_html:
Lopez might seem shy at first, but he‚Äôs a total sweetheart who‚Äôs ready to be someone‚Äôs best friend. He‚Äôs potty trained, very anffectionate and loves being close to his people. If you‚Äôre looking for a dog who enjoys gentle companionship and plenty of love, Lopez is your guy.

For walks, just grab a harness and Lopez is a breeze ‚Äî he‚Äôs easy to walk and happy to stroll by your side, making him a great match for both relaxed outings and daily routines.

Lopez would do wonderfully in a home that values cuddles, a sweet shy pup, and a loyal companion. Come meet him ‚Äît it won‚Äôt take long to see how special he is

name: Ink
description_html: Ink is a happy-go-lucky guy who‚Äôs always up for whatever adventure you have in mind - especially if it involves toys! Ink LOVES a toy and will get so excited he will jog around with it happily, plop in your lap to show you, and then jog around with it again. Despite his enthusiasm, Ink is surprisingly easy to handle ‚Äî volunteers found him simple to harness and eager to head out for fun. Once in the play yard, Ink is in his element: zooming around, chasing toys, and soaking up every moment. Outside the play yard, Ink is also a great jogging buddy in the making and happily kept pace on a short jog with one of his volunteer friends. He knows sit, likes treats, and is a smart boy who will be easy to train and be up for any adventure with his new people!

name: Chiquis
description_html:
If you‚Äôre looking for a dog who can make you laugh every single day, meet Chiquis ‚Äî a tiny powerhouse with a HUGE zest for life. Volunteers describe her as a ‚Äúbusy lady‚Äù who would rather zoom, hop, and play than sit still for a photo. She loves toys, loves movement, and loves turning the play yard into her personal racetrack.


Chiquis has classic puppy-style enthusiasm: she can be a little jumpy when excited, but she responds well to redirection and absolutely thrives when given something fun to do. She‚Äôs sweet, playful, and people-oriented, and once she burns off a little energy, her softer side starts peeking through.


Because she‚Äôs new to the shelter, we‚Äôre still learning all her quirks ‚Äî but what we know so far is that she‚Äôs spirited, silly, and ready for an adopter who appreciates a high-energy, toy-driven companion.


Chiquis would love a home with:

‚úî Playtime, toys, and activities

‚úî Positive training to help channel her enthusiasm

‚úî Someone who appreciates an energetic, goofy pup


If you‚Äôre searching for a pocket-sized adventure buddy who brings joy everywhere she goes, come meet Chiquis ‚Äî she‚Äôs ready to run right into her new life.

name: Yule
description_html:
Fluffy former teen mom and handsome future house panther kitten seek home together... 1 year old Nellie and 6 month old Yule have bonded quickly in their foster home.

Yule is a patient, gentle, playful boy who brought fearful but sweet Nellie out of hiding with his adorable antics. She joins him in daily games of chase, stalk the fly and their joint favorite: foster-mom-wand-acrobatics.

Yule is an expert cuddler and loves to sleep politely at the foot of the bed with his foster mom. Nellie enjoys pets in her own bed (purrs like a champ) and relaxes there with her fluffy feet hanging out. They share a litter-box and have perfect litter-box habits. They also love their cardboard scratchers.

Nellie and Yule are a truly joyful pair!

The adoption fee is waived for Nellie, Yule, and all Desperate Housecats!

name: Apples
description_html: Apples and Sally came to us as undersocialized kittens, and the best way to get them feeling confident and trusting of humans is to work with them in a home. They are shy but curious and playful, so can easily be engaged with toys and play time. Apples and Sally are still learning how to "cat" so they will need a patient person willing to give them time to settle into a new place. They don't have to be adopted together, but they do love cats and may benefit from a home with a social cat to show them how to trust humans more. These special kitties are ready for a chance at a better life in a loving home!

name: Sally
description_html: Apples and Sally came to us as undersocialized kittens, and the best way to get them feeling confident and trusting of humans is to work with them in a home. They are shy but curious and playful, so can easily be engaged with toys and play time. Apples and Sally are still learning how to "cat" so they will need a patient person willing to give them time to settle into a new place. They don't have to be adopted together, but they do love cats and may benefit from a home with a social cat to show them how to trust humans more. These special kitties are ready for a chance at a better life in a loving home!

name: Macho
description_html:
Macho is a very easygoing and gentle German Shepherd who loves to show off his tricks. He knows ‚Äúsit,‚Äù ‚Äúshake,‚Äù and ‚Äúdown!‚Äù He is very easy to walk on a leash and loves to be close to his humans for cuddles and pets. He‚Äôs one of the sweetest dogs around and would be perfect for anyone looking for a laid-back shepherd.  

He's recently been paired with another dog and could do well with a dog sibling after a meet-and-greet!

name: Matilda
description_html: Matilda is a friendly, easy going tabby girl who came in as a stray. She enjoys pets and will take every opportunity to have a snack! She came from an area with lots of cats and seems relaxed around them in the shelter, so she may do well in a home with cat friends. Matilda is ready for a life with a little more luxury today!

name: S'Mores
description_html:
S‚ÄôMores may start out a little cautious, but once he feels safe, he becomes an incredibly loving dog. Volunteers say he‚Äôs a ‚Äúhuge love bug‚Äù in a calm setting ‚Äî leaning in for affection, relaxing beside his person, and showing a softness that‚Äôs easy to fall for. He‚Äôs also house-trained (he pees as soon as he reaches the grass!) and walks calmly on leash once he settles into his routine. Because S‚ÄôMores is touch-sensitive, he needs a slow, gentle approach when meeting new people. With patience, he opens up beautifully.


S‚ÄôMores‚Äô best qualities:

  • Affectionate and snuggly with familiar human friends
  • Walks nicely on leash
  • House-trained
  • Responds well to routine and gentle handling


Best fit:

  • Patient adopter willing to go slow
  • Someone who understands sensitive, thoughtful dogs


S‚ÄôMores is a tender-hearted guy who just needs the right person to help him feel safe. Ready to take things slow? Come meet him today!

name: Squilliam Fancyson
description_html:
Squilliam Fancyson is the definition of handsome!


  • Housetrained
  • Good with other dogs
  • Loves to sniff around on walks
  • Will accept payment in pets


He loves to play hard to get by walking around as if you aren't there, but once you get his attention he's actually a softie!


Come meet Squilliam Fancyson today!

name: Bruno
description_html:
Bruno is a soft-hearted boy who‚Äôs finding shelter life a little overwhelming ‚Äî and who could blame him? While the noise and bustle can make him anxious at times, volunteers have seen something really special beneath the nerves: a sweet, gentle dog who seeks comfort and connection with his people.


On walks, Bruno is easy to handle and does his best, even when he‚Äôs feeling unsure. He‚Äôs also very treat-motivated, which helps him build confidence and makes him a great candidate for positive, reward-based training. One especially touching moment came when the shelter grew loud ‚Äî instead of shutting down, Bruno chose to approach and settle himself between two people, quietly asking for reassurance. It‚Äôs clear that once he feels safe, Bruno wants to trust.

name: Penny
description_html:
Penny, aka Pretty Penny, was born to love and be loved. She has two modes: Tornado on four legs and couch potato ‚Äî there is no in between!

This 8-month-old, 45-lb German Shepherd mix is a delightful blend of playful, goofy, and sweetly clingy. She‚Äôs clumsy in the most endearing way, loves climbing right into your lap (despite being far too big for it), has zero concept of personal space and will definitely stare at you like you‚Äôre her favorite person in the world. Personal space? Never heard of it. Whether she‚Äôs doing zoomies across the yard or melting into the couch, Penny‚Äôs favorite place is wherever you are.

Penny is very food-motivated ‚Äî and while her attention span might rival that of a gnat (or a chicken nugget üçó), she‚Äôs smart and eager to please. She‚Äôs what we like to call a ‚Äúpay-me-first‚Äù type of employee. She knows sit, look at me, paw, and lay down, but she expects to see the goods (aka treats) before performing her tricks. The good news? She‚Äôs starting to respond to commands without a treat in sight ‚Äî progress, people!

She‚Äôs still learning her strength when it comes to jumping up and gentle mouthing during play, so continued guidance will help her polish those puppy manners. She‚Äôs house-trained and crate-trained, has never had an accident indoors, and sleeps soundly through the night. She may whine a bit when you leave or head upstairs (she‚Äôs just making sure you remember how much she loves you), but she‚Äôs improving as she gains confidence and trust.

She‚Äôs shown interest in other dogs and has been friendly with neighborhood pups, though she can get a bit too excited during greetings. Penny would thrive in a home where she gets plenty of attention, consistent training, and space to zoom around.

She‚Äôs a medium-energy girl who needs time to play, but she‚Äôs just as happy to curl up beside you for hours. She does have a jealous streak ‚Äî after all, she believes she‚Äôs the star of the household ‚Äî and her bark is as big as her personality, so a family who can appreciate her ‚Äúbig voice‚Äù will fit her best.

If you‚Äôre looking for a loyal, silly, endlessly loving companion who will keep you laughing and your heart full, Pretty Penny might just be your perfect match. üíõ

She's currently not a big fan of car rides and can only tolerate about 20-minute drives (she gets car sick) but we're hoping she'll be able to work through that as time goes on.

Adoption requirements:

üíõ Room to play (and zoom)

üíõ Tolerance for dramatic barking

üíõ Love for goofy dogs who give 110% in everything they do

name: Twilight
description_html: Twilight is beautiful - the most photogenic on campus. She is playful, energetic, smart, and ready for an adventurous life.

name: Lady Pablo
description_html:
Meet Lady Pablo

She's been recently paired with a couple of sweet makeover agents, her foster parents, who along with the sponsored care she receives from her friends at ClassicCaninesATX, are restoring her body and spirit. She had been left behind in the washroom of an apartment building, heavily matted into a large fur ball. We don't believe she was ever left outdoors. Someone taught this sweet baby love, they simply did not have the ability to care for her.

She's spayed and heartworm negative. Her weight is perfect. Her matts have been shaved off and for the first time in years she is walking on her real paws, she can feel wind on her skin, her body is capable of full stretches, she can run and fully "feel" again. With that comes time to adjust to her new body and touch, requiring understanding, patience and light management by her VIPs. She loves love and has a spirit that will warm your soul, but can be subject to occasional startles--her body is new to her..

Lady Pablo seems to be very content near cats.

She's had limited engagement with dogs and seems to mostly co-exist, although we think she would prefer to have all of the people attention for herself.

Her ideal person or people will have some experience with small dogs that need a little extra help and guidance in life, It's her turn to catch up for all the years she's lost out on.

Interested in learning more?

Click on her link to reach her foster parents.

name: Goldie
description_html: Gorgeous girl Goldie was brought to the shelter as a stray with a fractured pelvis. Shelter staff think she was hit by a car. She spent much of her early puppyhood healing and recovering on crate rest. But she is now healed up, good as new and thriving in foster! Goldie is a lovely Belgian Shepherd mix and a sweet little goofball and will grow up to be an elegant, long-legged blonde! If she was a person, she'd be a supermodel! At 7 months old she is about 40 pounds and will likely top out around 60 pounds She can be a little shy meeting new humans, but warms up quickly. She recently attended several busy adoption events full of new people, dogs, sights and sounds and Goldie was a perfect little lady and behaved beautifully. She was great with all the kids who stopped to pet her as well. She is about 99% potty trained and she's a natural at walking on a loose leash! She loves to play with other dogs and wears out her two big canine foster brothers running around the yard. She has been around a cat and wanted to play with it. But she's still a puppy and can adapt to living with cats. This sweet little lady would make a stellar family dog and a great active buddy for anyone looking for a pup that is equal parts energetic adventurer and snugglebug! Could she be your dreamgirl???

name: Ginger
description_html: Ginger is a smart, curious pup. She is super focused on you or cheese or that sound coming from over there.

name: Falcor
description_html:
Falcor is a big, gorgeous boy who was surrendered to AAC with a urethral obstruction. The blockage ultimately cleared but later re-occurred, requiring that he undergo perineal urethrostomy surgery (this surgery removes the narrow part of the urethra, intended to prevent additional blockages).


Falcor completed his recovery in foster care, and is now ready for his permanent home. While his recovery has gone smoothly, his new family needs to provide him with a prescription diet to prevent and minimize future bladder inflammation. His current wet food favorites are Purina Pro Plan Savory UR Selects Salmon and Hills Prescription Diet Urinary Care with Ocean Fish. For dry food, he likes Hills CD and Royal Canin Urinary SO.


Falcor is incredibly patient, gentle, and sweet! He will do best in a household as an only pet or where his access to food is separate from other pets. He would do GREAT as a family pet because he is so gentle and loving.


See Falcor on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/falcor_blue?igsh=N3M4dHBjOWN1ejdz


I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!


The adoption fee is waived for Falcor and all Desperate Housecats!

name: Rune
description_html:
Rune is an absolute standout pup who wins hearts everywhere he goes. At events, he‚Äôs the perfect gentleman ‚Äî he passed his patio test with flying colors, calmly snuggled strangers, and even helped recruit new volunteers as the unofficial greeter at the AAS table.

On walks, Rune is a dream. He has excellent leash manners, takes treats gently, doesn‚Äôt jump, and consistently holds his business until he‚Äôs outside. He‚Äôs easygoing, responsive to cues, and just wants to be told he‚Äôs a strong, good boy.

Rune also gets along well with other dogs, as he‚Äôs currently sharing a suite with a friendly companion.

With his charm, kindness, and easygoing nature, Rune is truly a special dog. He‚Äôs simply waiting for the right family to notice him.

name: Cypress
description_html:
This is a very sweet, medium-energy 3-year-old happy boy. He's playful and affectionate, walks well on a leash, and does well with other dogs.

Cypress is always dressed to impress in his tuxedo-style coat. It has a little wirey element that makes him stand out.

name: Muffin
description_html:
Muffin is a playful little furball who‚Äôs ready to find her forever home! This sweet kitten is the perfect mix of cuddly and spunky ‚Äî she‚Äôll chase her toys with zoomie-level energy one minute, then curl up purring in your lap the next. She is an expert cuddler when it is time for bed.


Muffin has a fearless, friendly nature and gets along wonderfully with gentle dogs who know how to give a cat her space. She‚Äôs curious, confident, and always up for new adventures.

name: Angel
description_html:
~ Meet Angel

With 11 yrs of wisdom she's demonstrated herself well as a perfect house mate. Her owner went into hospice. See her short video to see how she has coped with life in the kennel. She's a low maintenance lady who has short spurts of activity before settling in to watch the world from a window view. Let's resolve to make her stay in the shelter system a short one. And if you will give her some small but important pleasures, like letting her hide her toys outdoors, even though they are barely hidden, and offering a cozy cushy place to rest, she promises to be your very best and quiet friend. And she'll love your friends and family too, including the kiddos. Angel is family friendly and ready to spend the holiday in a forever home.


All Adopters of dogs 7 yrs and up receive a $150 veterinary care credit, a $100 Chewy eGift card and adoption fees are waived - ready to make a difference? Reach out to caring@classiccanines.org

name: Oso
description_html:
Adorable, lovable 1-year-old shepherd mix


Loves cuddles and playtime with toys


Walks well on a leash


Gets along great with other dogs


A perfect blend of affection and fun

name: Monkey
description_html: Monkey is a 9 month old Labrador retriever ready for his forever home! He enjoys playing fetch, cuddles, walks, and looking outside the window. He‚Äôs crate trained, potty trained and leash trained (A true superstar)! He loves everyone, dogs, children, men, and women.

name: M'Jay
description_html:
M‚ÄôJay came to the shelter with her two brothers after her owner became too ill to care for them. Since then, this tenderhearted girl has been slowly learning that her new world is still a safe place. She may be shy at first, but once she trusts you, her sweetness comes rushing forward ‚Äî soft eyes, gentle tail wags, and a desire to be near her person. Volunteers have been surprised by how easy, affectionate, and cooperative she is once she‚Äôs out of the kennel.


M‚ÄôJay‚Äôs Best Traits:

  • Soft, sweet temperament once she warms up
  • Curious and thoughtful ‚Äî she wants to be brave
  • Great leash manners with a slow, gentle approach
  • Treat-motivated, which helps build trust quickly
  • Calms beautifully in quiet spaces
  • Likely dog-friendly based on her history with her siblings


Ideal Home:

  • A calm, patient household where she can warm up at her own pace
  • Adopters who enjoy watching a shy dog blossom
  • A home with another friendly, gentle dog would likely help her confidence
  • Someone who will support her ‚Äúgo slow‚Äù style, especially at first
  • A family ready to celebrate small wins as she opens up


Because of her history, we believe M‚ÄôJay may thrive in a home with other dogs. If you have a resident dog, come by the shelter to set up a meet-and-greet with our behavior team ‚Äî they‚Äôll help ensure everyone is a good match.


M‚ÄôJay is a quiet gem with so much love to give. If you‚Äôre looking for a dog who will bond deeply and blossom in the right environment, this sweet girl is absolutely worth meeting.

name: Finley
description_html: Finley is a cuddly, affectionate boy who has lived with other cats and small dogs. In a home, this guy loves to run around and play with his toys. Sometimes play time can get a little too exciting and Finley may give a little nip due to overstimulation. So, he would benefit from an adopter who understands this behavior and can help guide him. Finley is over kennel life and would much rather spend the rest of his days in a home!

name: Peaches
description_html: Peaches came to us as a stray so we don't know about her history, but we can tell this resilient girl has overcome some challenges just to get here! She may look a little rough on the outside but she's a marshmallow cuddlebug on the inside. Peaches is gentle and affectionate, and she'll do anything for a treat. She's in need of some TLC and extra snacks to get her where she deserves to be. She loves people and does well on leash (though it may still be a learning process). We are looking for a loving foster home to get her out of the shelter if she isn't adopted soon!

name: Meatloaf
description_html: Meatloaf may be all muscle on the outside, but inside he's just waiting for an opportunity for cuddles and play time. He's a goofy guy who loves to go on walks, but still learning those leash skills. (Meatloaf has yet to look in the mirror and realize how thick his own neck is.) He loves treats and will easily sit for them. He immediately becomes a happy boy when he gets to go on a walk and hang out with people. Meatloaf would probably LOVE a yard to hang out in. He's a nature lover. But, he's also an excellent, calm boy when crated. It doesn't take much to please this guy. Meatloaf is ready to go home today!

name: Fudge
description_html: True to his name, Fudge is as sweet as they come! He is a gentle soul who will shower you with love and devotion. Fudge is house‚Äëtrained, walks well on leash, and has a heart full of affection to share. He‚Äôs mellow by nature, the kind of dog who will happily sit by your side and gaze at you with soulful eyes that seem to look straight into your heart.

name: Blitz
description_html:
Sweet, playful 1-year-old with higher puppy energy. He's smart and knows some tricks already.

Blitz is a lightning-fast runner ‚Äî true to his name. He may seem dog-reactive in the shelter due to excitement, not aggression.

A meet-and-greet is recommended for homes with resident dogs.

Blitz would thrive with a large fenced yard or multiple daily walks.


Likely to shine after decompression and quiet time in a home

name: Spruce
description_html: Spruce is a goofy, playful bunny rabbit. He likes balls and stuffies and bouncing around with a human. He is outgoing, fearless and ready for adventures. He has been paired with other dogs.

name: Aurora
description_html: Aurora started out extremely shy in the shelter, but she's becoming a happy, wiggly girl. She's an affectionate girl with people, but the loud noises of the shelter and all the dogs around her still sometimes can be overwhelming. We could see this timid lady blossoming in a quiet home where she can get into a consistent routine and get lots of encouragement for every act of bravery. She relaxes outside on walks and enjoys snuggling up against her friends. Ask our team about foster or adoption for this special girl.

name: Hans
description_html:
Handsome Hans was brought to AAC very thin and dehydrated. Despite how he felt, he was extremely loving and social.

Now living in foster care, Hans has gained weight and made a complete recovery. All he needs now is a permanent home, with or without other cats, where he can sit in your lap, get 3 squares a day, and give/receive tons of affection.

I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!

The adoption fee is waived for Hans and ALL Desperate Housecats!

name: Starlight
description_html:
Starlight is waiting for her inner self to come shining through! But this is hard for a shy kitty to do in the shelter. She could use some extra encouragement to help her feel brave, and the true key to achieving this is getting into the right home. Starlight loves cuddles and gets comfort from slow, gentle interactions with people. She may also enjoy the company of feline friends. Starlight has a sparkle inside that she's waiting for someone to discover and appreciate!

I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!

The adoption fee is waived for Starlight and ALL Cactus Cats/Desperate Housecats!

name: Figgy Puddin'
description_html: Figgy Puddin is an absolute charmer! He's easy for walks and loves to get his wiggles out in a play yard. Figgy has a gentle curiosity for other dogs and people that he sees on his outings. Once play time is over, he's happy to just hang out and watch the world while getting cuddles from his friends. This affectionate and easy going guy is the perfect catch!

name: Bentley
description_html:
Very well-mannered and calm

Very well trained - knows many tricks!

Medium energy (but low energy for a Shepherd!)

Walks loosely on leash with no pulling or reactivity to big dogs or small animals (birds,squirrels)

Does not jump

If you want a GOOD dog that will fit right into your home, this is your guy!

name: Quin
description_html:
Quin is a gentle, shy, incredibly sweet dog who has been through far more than most pups should ‚Äî and yet he remains soft, playful, and eager to connect with people. Volunteers describe him as easy to leash, easy to walk, and a joy to spend time with. He enjoys treats, learns quickly, and loves relaxing on the couch or exploring outside.


Before coming to the shelter, Quin lived peacefully with his finders‚Äô resident dogs and has shown no dog reactivity while at the shelter. He never fails to greet volunteers with wagging softness and calm manners. Once he feels safe, his personality opens up ‚Äî he‚Äôs playful, affectionate, and loves showing off his tricks.


Quin is treat-motivated and appears to be house-trained. While he starts his walks with enthusiastic pulling, he settles into an easy pace after a while. He can be a little shy at first, especially in noisy areas, and may be sensitive to strangers reaching into his space, so he‚Äôll do best with someone who can let him warm up gently at his own pace.


Quin would thrive with:

‚úî A calm, patient home

‚úî Adults or older teens who respect his space

‚úî A resident dog who enjoys soft, friendly company (meet-and-greets available!)

‚úî Positive reinforcement and predictable routines


If you already have a dog, our behavior team can help set up a meet & greet to make sure it‚Äôs a great fit.


Quin is a truly good dog who has handled life's highs and lows with remarkable grace. Come meet him ‚Äî you‚Äôll be amazed by how much sweetness and heart he brings to the moment.

name: Miles
description_html:
Meet Miles üê∂üíô


Miles is an absolute sweetheart who will melt your heart the moment you meet him. He has puppy-like charm!


On leash, Miles is a dream‚Äîhe walks with a loose leash and rarely pulls, preferring to take his time and thoughtfully sniff his surroundings.


In the play yard, his playful side shines! Miles loves a good game of fetch and is impressively polite about it. He happily drops the toy right at your feet, and if you don‚Äôt notice, he‚Äôll adorably nudge it closer, pick it up, and place it right into your hand. Watching him run around with his bouncy little hops is guaranteed to make you smile.


Indoors, Miles settles beautifully. In a real-life room, he explored a bit before relaxing on the couch with a toy, showing just how well he can switch from playtime to cuddle time.


Miles would make a fantastic companion for someone looking for a sweet, playful pup. He‚Äôs truly a precious baby who‚Äôs ready to bring joy, laughter, and love into his forever home. üêæüíô

name: Lady
description_html:
If you are looking for a sweet, easy going cuddle

bug then Lady is your girl! She would love nothing more than to cuddle up on the couch to watch tv and relax with you ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Ash
description_html:
Ash is a very sweet boy, with an instant, huge purr and he loves attention. He‚Äôs easy going, loves attention first, last and most everywhere in between if he‚Äôs not playing with his sibs. He‚Äôs low+ energy so far, maybe a little more as he grows. Use the email below to reach out to his foster directly for more information or to set up a meet/greet.

 

- Email: adaywithfosters@gmail.com

- Pictures & Info: https://www.instagram.com/adaywithfosters

 

Ash is middle sized of his five siblings. He enjoys pets, head scratches, belly rubs and he‚Äôll serpentine between your legs for attention. Like all his siblings, he‚Äôll often purr before you even pick him up and he stays in your arms a little longer each time as he and his sibs are learning about being carried about. He‚Äôll politely ask to be put down when he‚Äôs ready‚Ä¶ and may follow you around‚Ä¶ unless he has to run off and play with his sibs. He‚Äôs often keenly aware of where you are and watches, ready for attention and sometimes hard to get a picture as he gets up to greet you. He‚Äôs often close by to help you find toys under the couch, look in cabinets and even close to help watch you clean litter boxes.


During the day, he zooms and plays interchangeably with his sibs. He also loves to play with toys of any kind- string, and fast toys like ping-pong balls, rattle mice and springs! He‚Äôs social and doesn‚Äôt shy away from new people but he‚Äôs still maturing and learning to enjoy attention and to relax in a lap. He gently hand wrestles when you play with him, rub his belly, as he nibbles on your fingers or he often licks your fingers. So far, he hasn‚Äôt asked for a lap but will chirp at your feet to be picked up. He often crashes near-by, under my chair or under my desk on a blanket near my feet‚Ä¶ or he naps/sleeps interchangeably with his sibs. During the day, he sleeps on the sofa with them or high up on the cat tree.

 

He‚Äôs a little soft spoken when you talk to him or he wants your attention when you get close‚Ä¶ and he might talk more as he grows. He does speak up when it‚Äôs meal time, telling you he‚Äôs ready. He climbs a tall sisal cat tree well to nap with his sibs as well and scratches a rope tree very well. At night, he‚Äôs often first up on the bed, wanting attention while I read. He likes to be close but so far doesn‚Äôt cuddle up‚Ä¶ and by dawn, they‚Äôre all off playing. I think he would do fine as a solo kitten for someone who works from home, as he loves attention. He would do very well with any of his siblings- Cormac 17077, Pumpkin 17078, November 17079, Wish 17080 or Maple 17081. Ash is polite and not pushy, and think he would also do very well with a cat or a kitten who wants a playmate, even a dog who would like a companion.


He‚Äôs pretty good with the litter box. He‚Äôs also very good at getting his front nails clipped when he‚Äôs a little snoozy as he enjoys the closeness. He warms up pretty quickly with new people too and doesn‚Äôt shy away. I think he‚Äôll do fine with children once used to their energy. He‚Äôs fine w/ my older cat and he‚Äôs polite to her sniffing, etc. I think he would do OK with a dog too once he gets used to them after slow introductions.

name: K‚Äôjay
description_html: K'Jay had to be surrendered due to their owner's health issues. This big boy is a cuddler who loves praise! Tell him what a good boy he is and he will be happy the whole day about it. This friendly boy will gladly sit in your lap or lean in to be closer to you. He's still working on his leash manners and doesn't always realize his own size or strength but he responds well to gentle coaxing. K'Jay is a young, smart guy who is eager to please and loves learning!

name: Bellanova
description_html:
To say that Bellanova doesn‚Äôt like other pets is a bit of an understatement. She REALLY doesn‚Äôt like them.

Bellanova suffers from anxiety, and does best when on medication (she was previously on gabapentin, and it worked very well for her). Her previous owner loved her dearly, but could no longer take care of her, so they brought her to AAC. We would LOVE to get her into a real home, either through adoption or through foster (she does best with women).

Her owner told us that Bellanova is playful, talkative, independent, and high energy. She will give hard love bites when she‚Äôs overstimulated. Due to her anxiety, she is afraid of almost everything, and when she is startled, she is likely to attack. As long as she is on medication, she is well-behaved.

Bellanova must go to a home with no other pets and a very cat-savvy adopter.  

I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!

The adoption fee is waived for Bellanova and all Desperate Housecats!

name: Aggie
description_html: Aggie is the perfect size pocket pittie. She is chill and such a good girl.

name: Rudolph
description_html:
Meet Rudolph!

This sweet, floppy-eared pup is as cute as his name suggests. Rudolph is a young, energetic bundle of joy who loves nothing more than playtime and cuddles. Whether he's chasing after a tennis ball or curling up beside you for snuggles, he does everything with a big, happy heart.

Rudolph is a fetch champion in the making and absolutely lights up when he sees a toy. He‚Äôs also a dream on walks‚Äîno pulling, no zig-zagging‚Äîjust a gentle little trot from a very good boy who loves exploring the world by your side.

Playful, affectionate, and endlessly cheerful, Rudolph is ready to bring joy to a lucky family. If you‚Äôre looking for a sweet companion who‚Äôll keep you smiling and your heart full, come meet this happy fella today! üêæüíõ


email blueplusbusters@gmail.com for more info!

name: Hannah
description_html:
Hannah is a sweet, loving pup with a spirit as big as her smile.




She‚Äôs bursting with excitement at the thought of finding her forever person‚Äîsomeone to take on life by her side. Hannah loves a good walk, where she can follow her nose, soak in her surroundings, and enjoy the adventure. Along the way, she‚Äôll look to you for reassurance, gaining confidence from your presence.




But exploring isn‚Äôt all Hannah is dreaming of. At heart, she‚Äôs simply searching for someone who makes her feel safe and secure‚Äîwhether that means discovering the world together or curling up on the couch. In return, she‚Äôll shower you with affection and plenty of enthusiastic face kisses.


Come meet your future best friend, Hannah, at AAC today and see why our volunteers are so excited to watch her shine in a home of her very own.

name: Habibi
description_html:
This sweet, snuggly pup is ready to steal your heart! He loves nothing more than curling up for head rubs and soaking in all the affection he can get. When it‚Äôs playtime, he‚Äôs a fetch superstar‚Äîhe‚Äôll chase the ball with enthusiasm and proudly drop it right at your feet for another round!


He does great with other playful dogs and enjoys having buddies to romp around with. On walks, he‚Äôs a dream‚Äîeasy on the leash and happy to explore by your side. He would thrive in a home with a yard or anywhere he can stretch his legs, play fetch, and run around.


Habibi is so ready for his forever family. Could it be yours? Come meet him today!

name: Gumdrop
description_html: Gumdrop is all wiggles and zoomies! He's a young guy who loves to run around in the play yard and get all that energy out. He seems housetrained and listens to direction. He's working on his leash skills (he doesn't seem to know his own strength). This handsome boy is ready for his freedom from kennel life!

name: Mira
description_html:
Mira and Dove are shy girls who came into the shelter as young stray kittens. They seem to rely on each other and love each other, so they may do well in a home together. These girls enjoys treats and pets, you just have to go slowly and give them some time to open up. They are still learning that the shelter doesn't have to be a scary place, but we think they will truly blossom once they are in a quiet home. Mira and Dove are members of our Cactus Cat program for shy cats who need a little encouragement.


The fee is waived for these special girls and all Cactus Cats.

name: Edmond
description_html:
Sweet Edmond has had a rough start to life. He was found living on the streets with two other dogs, doing his best to survive day by day. When his little group was rescued, Edmond was understandably overwhelmed by all the changes. After the female dog he was closest to was taken to the shelter, he completely shut down in his finder‚Äôs home ‚Äî his world had suddenly become a much lonelier place.


Despite his fear, Edmond has a gentle soul. He‚Äôs not ready to seek out affection yet, but he watches the world with soft, hopeful eyes ‚Äî you can tell he wants to trust.

Edmond will need a very patient, understanding foster or adopter who can give him time to feel safe again.


A calm home, possibly another friendly and confident dog, and someone who can offer stability and kindness will help him blossom at his own pace.


If you have the heart to help a scared dog learn that the world can be kind, Edmond is waiting for you.

name: Burl Ives
description_html: Burl Ives is an easy going buy eager for pets! He loves affection and just needs a friend to share his days with. This laid back gentleman would make a great addition to a loving home just in time for the holiday!

name: Lil Baby Lou
description_html:
Yes, he‚Äôs 95 pounds.


Yes, his name is Lil Baby Lou.

And yes‚Ä¶ he is absolutely, unquestionably a baby.


Lou is a dog built like a linebacker but powered entirely by love, snuggles, and the belief that he was meant to be a lap dog. Don‚Äôt let the size fool you‚Äîthis big boy‚Äôs favorite activities include cuddling, being near his people, and giving hugs. His heart is as soft as a marshmallow. 


Lil Baby Lou is extremely house trained (a true gentleman), rides like a champ in the car, and is always down for a good toy session. Toss him a toy and you‚Äôll see his playful, goofy side shine‚Äîthen he‚Äôll happily settle in for some quality couch time. If you‚Äôve ever wanted a giant teddy bear who thinks he‚Äôs a baby and has total soul dog potential, Lou is your guy. 


Come meet Lil Baby Lou‚Äîhe promises to take up space in your home, on your couch, and most importantly, in your heart. Email orangedotcrew@gmail.com to learn more and kickstart this heartwarming journey. For more delightful updates, follow Orange Dot Crew on Facebook and Instagram.

name: Shadow
description_html: Shadow is a sweet and energetic kitten . He has a great personality. He wants to bond strongly to a person ( we named him shadow as early on he wanted to be with his foster mom all the time). He cries if we kept him separated from the animals and people in the home. He gets along with all our cats , male and female, but will likely do better in a home with another male cat who will wrestle and play with him or another kitten his age who has a lot of energy. If there are no other pets then he would prefer to have someone who is working from home and wants a kitten to cuddle with them while they work.

name: Reggie
description_html: Reggie may be a bit shy in the shelter, but we can't blame him. It's a crazy place sometimes and this low-key guy would probably prefer a quieter space to relax. He's very affectionate and can even be playful once he is outside with his friends. There's a lot to love about this gentle boy. Reggie is content to be close to his people and get belly rubs while you tell him what a good boy he is. We expect him to truly blossom in a home and become the brave boy he was meant to be!

name: Samuel
description_html: Samuel is a very brave young man who was rescued from the streets with his sibling when he was just a little one! He is quite courageous to have survived living outside when so young and tiny! He may prefer changes come slowly with plenty of time for him to adjust and adapt, but once he does, he is very sweet and loves cuddles and pets! He will likely get along with other calm kitties and doggies if introduced slowly. Samuel is resilient and strong and has his whole life ahead of him to love you and be your very best friend!

name: Quinn
description_html: Quinn came to the shelter due to housing restrictions. He's a shy, quiet boy who is happy to just be included in the company of his people. Quinn can be cuddly without being demanding. He's content to hang out with his family and know that he's loved. One thing he doesn't enjoy is being hungry, so keep this baby boy well fed and he'll love you forever. He has lived with other cats and dogs, so may do well in a multi-pet home.

name: Cillian
description_html: Cillian came into the shelter due to housing restrictions. He's shy, quiet and may prefer to hide when he's feeling insecure. Cillian was a very independent cat in his previous home. He's low-maintenance and there may be times you don't even know he's there! But, Cillian will choose his moments for snuggles and he does enjoy pets. His one weakness might be shoelaces. He loves to chew them, so put your shoes away and get this guy a proper wand toy! He's lived with other cats and dogs so may do well in a multi-pet home.

name: Olive
description_html: Olive is a friendly girl who loves pets and the company of people. She seems fine around other cats in the shelter. This outgoing girl was being cared for in the community, but could no longer stay with her caregiver. She would probably enjoy a window for watching the world or a catio or other safe outdoor situation. Olive is ready to explore a home and get all the love and attention she deserves!

name: Poinsettia
description_html: Little Poinsettia came in with a small right eye that was infected. It's healed nicely so she is now ready for adoption! This shy girl may need a little comfort to help her feel secure in a new home, but we don't think it will take her long to settle in. Adopt Poinsettia today!

name: Rodrigo
description_html:
Meet Rodrigo


He's a sweet, happy boy getting his footing in a new strange place while he gets back to a healthy weight. He seems housetrained and he's been passing other dogs easily with curious interest. He gets some extras 'round here - like an extra walk, the comforts of soft bedding on a chill night, and a bedtime chew snack. He'll ask for belly rubs when he's feeling extra playful. And he has no shortage of human girlfriends. Come meet this short stack cutie in person or reach out with questions to his advocates at caring@classiccanines.org

name: Tyson
description_html:
Meet Tyson


He's been in a finder foster's condo for one month while waiting for his intake appointment. He was an awesome guest. He stayed with a female 50 lb dog and 3, yes THREE, cats! What a good boy.

He's a very nice walking dog and got out for 4-5 potty breaks a day and never marked or had accidents in the home. He even was quite agreeable to bathing.

He knows common cues like sit, stay and come.


His most endearing qualities - he's a big, beautiful, loving baby, inside and out, extremely loyal and obedient - likes to cuddle on a lap like a little lap dog. Tyson is advocated for by his friends at ClassicCaninesATX - hurry in to see him in person while we gather his photos. .

name: Crosby
description_html: Crosby is terrified in the shelter. This shy boy was abandoned so we understand his difficulty trusting us so soon in his stay at the shelter. But, we'd really love for him to have a true friend, the one he deserves in a home, and we suspect he will be a loyal companion to whoever offers him their friendship. If not adopted soon, we'd love to see Crosby in foster care where he can relax and come out of his shell gradually. He will do best in a low traffic, quiet spot with someone who can provide consistent, gentle attempts at interaction while also giving him the space he requests to adapt.

name: Meaty Manz
description_html:
Looking for a sweetheart who will melt your heart the moment you meet him? Meaty Manz is your guy! As soon as you step into his kennel, this lovable little meatball will climb right into your lap and rest his head there, soaking up all the affection he can get.


He‚Äôs easy to harness and a dream on leash‚Äîwalking with perfect loose-leash manners and showing no fuss around other dogs. For Meaty Manz, the simple joy of being out of his kennel is enough. Along the way, he‚Äôll happily pause for cuddle breaks, which are his absolute favorite.


This gentle, affectionate pup is the kind of dog who wins hearts instantly. One meet-and-greet with Meaty Manz and you‚Äôll understand‚Äîhe‚Äôs the sweetest companion you could ask for, ready to bring love and snuggles into his forever home.


Meaty Manz would love:


A family who enjoys cuddle sessions as much as he does

Daily walks where he can show off his perfect leash skills

A calm, loving home where he can thrive

Meaty Manz is ready to steal your heart and be your best friend for life. Come meet him today!

name: Callie
description_html: Callie is playful, friendly and cuddly. She ended up at the shelter after her owner passed away. She loves people and will gladly sit in your lap if given the opportunity. Callie was originally a momma cat, and she does have some of that boss-lady calico "catitude" with other cats, so she may do best in a home without cats. She may be prone to overstimulation which can be curbed with lots of play time activities and watching her body language during cuddle sessions. This affectionate girl would love a home before the holidays!

name: Toby
description_html:
Toby arrived at the shelter as a stray, and the shelter environment has been very overwhelming for him.


Toby has lost about 5 pounds since arriving because of shelter stress.

Even though he‚Äôs frightened, he has been nothing but gentle and calm with staff and volunteers.


We know he‚Äôll blossom once he has a peaceful space to decompress.

If you can offer Toby a safe, soothing place to heal, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!


Since arriving at the foster home he is slowly coming out of his shell. He is the sweetest boy who loves pets and yummy treats! He is a little shy at first but with TLC he is amazing!

name: Sully
description_html:
Sully was found as a stray near the HEB by William cannon and I-35. Not much is known about his life before this moment, but he has made quite the impression in the short time we have had him. From the moment we set eye on him he was a happy gentleman, sitting calmly outside HEB. He accepted food gently, and belly rubs with great enthusiasm. Since that moment Sully has proven to be a mild mannered, medium to low energy dog, who is grateful to be inside and willing to accept any love shown to him. He has met many people, tons of dogs and one sassy cat, and each time he is polite, calm and friendly. He gently wrestles with our high energy dog, but ultimately loves to flop over on his back during play and just wiggle on the ground. He does not resource guard but he is food motivated for training, and he walks well on leash. He doesn‚Äôt bark inside and will generally only bark outside if left alone, he for the most part just wants his human close by. He is willing to cuddle, but could easily be trained to stay off furniture as for the most part he just lays on the floor or his dog bed. Again he is calm with cats!! He shows mild interest in our cat but responds well to being redirected or even disciplined by the cat.i would recommend a slow introduction to be safe, but he is very gentle and just a giant lovable oaf. He has also played well and been friendly with every dog he has been introduced to. As a large unfixed male, this was something we were worried about initially, but as with everything else he has exceeded our expectations. And he will be fixed soon, so that will likely calm him even more.




Sully could do well in any environment but I believe his perfect home would be him with a kind family that maybe has a pet or two for him to be friends with. He would love a home where people are around and spending time with him or bringing him out on lots of walks. He deserves to be around people and loved and spoiled every day. Sully would not do well in a home where he is kept outside or as more of an outdoor dog, as he is a prince and deserves to be treated as such.




He is about 2 years old, in good health but heart worm positive. He is fully house trained, good with dogs and cats, children unknown but I have a strong sense he would be as gentle with them as every other person he has met. He is medium to low energy, but likes to play, and is opening up more everyday. So far he doesn‚Äôt jump or lick and has very good manners meeting new people. He is a great dog who deserves a very loving family

name: Shadow
description_html: Handsome Shadow is a happy, friendly dog who walks easily on leash and is very housetrained. He loves to romp around the playyard, running zoomies and chasing balls. Shadow also enjoys playing along the fence line with other social dogs. He responds promptly to basic commands and gently accepts treats. Shadow is a sweet, playful boy who will make a wonderful companion in a loving home. Come meet him!

name: Willow
description_html: Willow is a beautiful, young, sweet Catahoula Leopard dog. She‚Äôs such an easy leash walker, and checks in with her human by looking back with those gorgeous blue eyes on walks. She‚Äôs treat motivated and is great at responding to commands like ‚Äúsit‚Äù on a walk if you want to get her attention for a treat. She‚Äôs also super loving and cuddly. She‚Äôs curious about all things around her, quietly watching birds in a tree, listening to leaves rustling, and watching squirrels running around. She‚Äôs a wonderful combination of playful and sweet and would make such an amazing companion to her human.

name: Priscilla
description_html:
Priscilla may be a little shy at first, but she warms up quickly‚Äîespecially if you have treats! Once she‚Äôs comfortable, she turns into the snuggliest, cuddliest, kissiest girl you‚Äôve ever met. She‚Äôs incredibly gentle, with no mouthing or nipping, just pure sweetness.

When playtime arrives, she loves chasing toys around the yard and zooming happily after anything that bounces. She also walks beautifully on leash and enjoys exploring the world by your side.

Priscilla is ready to find her forever family‚Äîone that will give her the love and patience she deserves. Could that be you?

Come meet her and fall in love!

name: Teddy
description_html: Teddy and Liam came in together and love each other very much, so they should be adopted together. These boys arrived at the shelter when their owner was no longer physically able to care for them. Teddy is a cuddly lap cat who loves to play with toys. He's talkative and has no problem sharing his feelings with you. Liam is quiet, shy and more on the independent side, but he also enjoys play time. Liam is a calm soul who is content to hang out near his people and enjoy their company. These boys have been through a lot of change, so they may take a little time adapting to new situations. Give Teddy and Liam a chance today!

name: Liam
description_html: Teddy and Liam came in together and love each other very much, so they should be adopted together. These boys arrived at the shelter when their owner was no longer physically able to care for them. Teddy is a cuddly lap cat who loves to play with toys. He's talkative and has no problem sharing his feelings with you. Liam is quiet, shy and more on the independent side, but he also enjoys play time. Liam is a calm soul who is content to hang out near his people and enjoy their company. These boys have been through a lot of change, so they may take a little time adapting to new situations. Give Teddy and Liam a chance today!

name: Chico
description_html: Chico found his way into the care of community member as a stray pup running loose, but they were not able to keep him long term. Chico is a gentle guy who is still learning to walk on leash. He absolutely loves play time outside in a fenced area and has enjoyed the company of his human and canine friends. Chico may be shy at first, but his loving, silly personality comes out pretty quickly! He's affectionate and will listen to his person and follow their lead. This boy is smart and ready to learn all about life in a new home.

name: Princess Peach
description_html: Meet Princess Peach! She really wants you to because she loves new friends. This girl enjoys walks and play time with her friends, and if you give her a toy to carry around it will truly make her day! Princess Peach seems housetrained and crate trained. She's ready to take on the world with a toy in her mouth and a friend by her side, so say "hello" to this girl today!

name: Percy
description_html: Percy is an affectionate boy who cries out for attention. He has lived with cats and dogs but may prefer to be your #1 best boy! Percy is a lap cat who can't get enough love at the shelter. He'd rather be in a lap in his special person's home. He's also playful and would appreciate lots of toys as his holiday gift.

name: Waverly
description_html:
Waverly has a sweet, gentle, and soulful energy about her. She is very easygoing and well behaved. 

She checks all the boxes!:

  • gentle
  • loves people (Waverly loves cuddles and is a big people-pleaser and a great listener)
  • potty trained (no accidents at all in foster!)
  • dream on the leash (Waverly is not reactive to other dogs, animals, cars, and passerby‚Äôs - besides tail wags!)
  • greets calmly (with booty wiggles) 
  • perfect for tagging along on outings 
  • easy car rider
  • dog friendly
  • kid friendly 
  • kennel trained

Waverly was found as a stray, caring for her young puppies. It‚Äôs finally her turn to be cared for in her forever home!

name: Cream Puff
description_html:
This is Cream Puff, though his foster family calls him "Duckie" because he will follow any human or animal around like a little duckling. Cream Puff, aka Duckie, is a sweet little guy who has short little legs and a big personality. His hobbies include playing with his foster siblings, sassing cats, carrying around toys nearly as big as he is, and cuddling. If you want a dog equal parts energetic and snuggly, this little duckling would be perfect! 


He's very good with other dogs, plays well and shares toys and loves to play tug. He also enjoys going off by himself to chew on a favorite toy (Lamb Chop is currently his emotional support stuffy). He's curious about cats, and loves to bark and sass at them, from a safe distance of course. He's great with potty pads, and will go on them if they're available, and he's also doing great at going potty outside in the yard, especially if there are other dogs to show him where to go. He's very bright and picks up on things quickly, and is very treat/food motivated, so training will likely be a breeze!


And let's get back to that mention of cuddling - Cream Puff is a GREAT snuggler. Once he settles down for a nap or overnight, he loves to be plastered right up against a human or a dog friend. He also sleeps really well overnight, and if you're looking for a snuggly dog to sleep in your bed at night, he's definitely your guy! 


Cream Puff would love to go to a home with some dog friends to play with!

name: Manchas
description_html:
Meet Manchas

His human companions are off to places he can't reach, but that doesn't mean this wire-haired fox terrier isn't eager to join in on some adventure! He's a lively little ball of energy just waiting to burst out of his cozy kennel, and he adores EVERYONE without exception. At home, he'll be your charming entertainer, plus he has the added perk of keeping you informed about incoming guests and package deliveries. He previously shared his home with an older, large Labrador retriever who has sadly passed away. He dutifully enjoys his baths and nail trims, knows a few commands, never turns down a treat, and spends a lot of his time winning hearts.

name: Pudding Pop
description_html: Pudding Pop is a shy girl who won't ask for much attention at first. She does warm up slowly to new situations and people, but once she's comfortable Pudding Pop enjoys pets and will chirp out at you. She came in with kittens so she's still getting used to the idea of her empty nest and having the freedom to be her own girl. But, she's ready for the journey of a new home with someone who appreciates her for exactly who she is.

name: Buttercup
description_html:
Meet Buttercup ‚Äî the sweetest soul you‚Äôll ever meet.


This gentle, affectionate pittie came to us thanks to a kind Good Samaritan after she was found abandoned with her five puppies. Even on her first day, Buttercup showed us who she is at heart: calm, trusting, and endlessly loving. She allowed strangers to carry her and handle her puppies without a hint of worry ‚Äî a true testament to her gentle nature.


Her pups, already old enough to be weaned, returned to their finder and are quickly finding homes. Buttercup, however, stayed with us so we could care for an injury to her left front leg that left her a bit lame. X-rays showed no fractures, and with rest, medication, and TLC, she has made a remarkable recovery.


Now Buttercup is ready to take the next step: a foster or adoptive home of her very own.

She has quickly become a staff and volunteer favorite ‚Äî the kind of dog people go out of their way to visit because she brightens everyone‚Äôs day. We would love nothing more than to see her curled up on a soft bed in a real home instead of a kennel.


If you're looking for a gentle, loving companion who will melt your heart, Buttercup is your girl. Come meet her and see why we all adore her.

name: Cumbia
description_html: Cumbia is an easygoing 112-pound big girl available to foster or adopt. She is very housetrained and easy on a leash. She's sweet, affectionate and playful and would be great for anyone looking for a large, easy, and lovely companion. Come meet her today!

name: Rico
description_html: Shelter staff have named this handsome guy "Rico". He was found at the Ridge Apartments off of E. Slaughter Ln. If you are missing this boy, please visit us immediately to reclaim him!

name: Grecia
