description_html: Grecia came in with a leg injury that ultimately required an amputation. She was an excellent patient for us and has made a full recovery! Grecia doesn't let the missing leg keep her down. She's all about snuggles and purrs and big stretches. This lovable lady is ready for her home today!

name: Bo
description_html:
Meet Bo ~


Bo has lived a lifetime with one family with limited social engagement. He's currently in a foster arrangement while we learn his behaviors and capabilities, as a boy in his twilight years. He'll be getting a full comprehensive medical work up, sponsored by his advocates at ClassicCaninesATX. Check back for updates or write his advocates at caring@classiccanines.org

name: Persephone
description_html: This is a feral momma kitty who I have been working on taming in foster with her babies. She's still likely to hiss if approached too quickly and be tightened up as hard as a rock when you touch her, but with some dedication I have gotten her to start relaxing during pets and even put her chin up and press into some neck and chin scritches. Definitely can't pick her up with your hands, but placing a blanket or towel over her makes her limp enough to handle and transport her. I believe she can be domesticated and put into a good home, but it will take continued work. Named Persephone because I got two kittens from her the year before these four kittens, so she was like Persephone coming back from the underworld every year bringing me new pretty babies. She has now been spayed to end that cycle!

name: Meatball
description_html: Meatball is a loving, affectionate girl who came from a family who could no longer care for her. She's talkative and not afraid to express herself. While Meatball did live in a home with other pets, her previous owners think she may do best as the only pet. This full figured girl could use a diet to help her stay healthy and happy! She's ready for a home today.

name: Reba Mcentire
description_html:
Looking for a little star? Introducing Reba, a pup with a white coat splashed with unique brindle patches that look like someone painted her with love. She may be the runt of the litter, but nobody told her that. This girl walks around as if she has already sold out the Moody Center.




Reba is pure spunk, spirit, and sparkle. She‚Äôs the kind of pup who can make you laugh before your coffee hits, then curl up in your lap like a tiny country ballad.




She‚Äôs great with dogs, cats, and families. Come meet her! This girl was born to shine!

name: Sweet Pea
description_html: Sweet Pea is a fun little guy! Loves to play and play battle and run around with the other kittens. He can be a siren sometimes, squealing his cute little head off, but then he calms down and melts. He's the only of his siblings that is sleek rather than a puff ball. A very handsome gentleman!

name: Figgy Pudding
description_html: Little Figgy Pudding was rescued from a drainage ditch on UT campus where she was stuck. This scaredy girl went through a tough experience, so we understand why she would be shy at the shelter. She could use a patient adopter with a calm home to set her up for success as she learns that people are her friends.

name: Chief
description_html:
~ Wish: A comfy quiet place to heal

Chief has been getting rested, getting his skin needs tended to, rebuilding his strength as he's started on the healing process. His condition has already vastly improved in a few days. He's about 57 lbs, shy, quiet, and with demodex (non-contagious), also he's heart worm positive, not yet neutered and seems to be on the younger side of senior.


He has a GREAT prognosis to return to his full glory with the assistance of a loving helping hand.

Due to the pneumovirus protocol in place at Austin Animal Services, dogs will be released only to dog-free homes. He is available for adoption, rescue and foster. A foster will keep him out of the shelter while he heals and finds his forever.


Those who may be in a position to #MakeADifference for Chief, we'll appreciate hearing from you. Come in person to Austin Animal Services 11-6 daily if you have a dog-free home.

bit.ly/AACChief

name: Sassy
description_html: Per her foster, "This sweet cat was a stray that I started feeding. After about a month, she brought her 3 kittens into my garage. She is an affectionate and attentive mom."

name: Mila
description_html: Mila likes some cuddling and a lot of playing, jumping, and carrying around a toy mouse.

name: Mack
description_html: Mack is the only male and is a little bit shyer than his sisters! He also loves to play with his siblings and make spectacular leaps.

name: Millie
description_html: Millie is the most adventurous of the 3 kittens even though she is the smallest. She loves to rough and tumble with her littermates.

name: Flint
description_html: Fern and Flint arrived at the shelter after being abandoned on someone's property. They are very cuddly and easy going considering all that they have been through! Fern and Flint do not need to be adopted together, but they do get along with each other and may do well in a multi-cat home. These friendly felines are looking for some stability and safety in a loving home.

name: Sven
description_html: Sven is a playful kitten who is affectionate and active. He has been in foster with another kitten, who has been adopted; he enjoyed playing and snuggling with her. He is learning about the adult cats who live in his foster home.

name: Amos
description_html:
Amos, named after the character Amos Burton from The Expanse book and tv series, is a fun-loving red husky with icy blue eyes. He is the sweetest boy with a goofy personality and a tongue that's always hanging out.


Amos would love to be in a house with other dogs as he's very friendly and currently enjoys the company of his foster sister, but ultimately he just wants a safe place to call home where he can get belly rubs daily, chase a ball from time to time, and follow someone around.


He likes having time outside if there's someone to play with, but really wants to be near his people and will enjoy his afternoon naps wherever they are. The perfect companion at your feet, or on top of them.


Amos is great at letting you know when he needs to go outside for potty breaks and is working on getting better at car rides and walking manners. He is incredibly easy to pick up if need be. Treats are the best motivator and he'll gladly sit for a tasty snack, or two, or three.


Amos is ready to find his forever family. Click ‚ÄúAdopt Me‚Äù to connect with his foster!

name: Daisey
description_html:
~ Double the lovin'?

Zoe 19500 and Daisey 19501 were abandoned here because their owner was relocating overseas. We know very little except they lived together indoors. They've been checked over and vaccinated and now they need a place to go. These sisters love being together so we're hoping to keep them that way! They are in a lobby kennel and can be viewed through the glass.


Current procedures in use will allow releasing dogs ONLY to dog-free homes in an abundance of caution to not further spread Pneumovirus into the community.


Zoe is the brindle and is 11 and just 36 lbs, is spayed, and heart worm negative. bit.ly/AAS-Zoe

Daisey is the lab mix and she's almost 11, is spayed, is 72 lbs (well loved) and heart worm negative. bit.ly/AAS-Daisey


What a way to start a sweet dog family

These two hopefuls would love to be home for the holidays! They love to sleep together.

Whether you adopt or foster, you won't pay any fees and you will get all the supplies you need and plenty of support.

name: Sopapilla
description_html: Sopapilla was brought to the shelter due to their owner's allergies. She's a low energy girl who loves to curl up in her person's lap for snuggles. In fact, her #1 favorite thing is cuddling and she even enjoys being held. Sopapilla may be shy with new people, but just give her a chance and she will be your friend for a lifetime.

name: Theodore
description_html: Theodore is an affectionate guy who got himself into some trouble and ended up with pelvic fractures. But this lucky guy did an excellent job of healing and now he's ready for a less adventurous life indoors! Theodore loves snuggles and attention. He's as good natured as he is handsome!

name: Licorice
description_html: Licorice is a confident, playful and cuddly boy! He loves to get pets and will ask for more. He also enjoys being held and cuddled. Licorice gets along well with other cats, too! He's ready to run around a home just in time for the holidays.

name: Truffles
description_html: Truffles is a little shy at first, but that doesn't last long. Once you start petting her, she relaxes and wants more snuggles! She's the perfect companion, and she gets along well with other cats.
